titles.title: Finding Opportunities for Resource Exploration Act
Finding ORE Act
Finding Opportunities for Resource Exploration Act
Finding ORE Act
Finding ORE Act

A bill to allow the Secretary of the Interior to enter into memoranda of understanding for the purpose of scientific and technical cooperation in the mapping of critical minerals and rare earth elements, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Risch with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 93.

committee.name: Senate Foreign Relations
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
